name: Archery Animal Hunting Simulator 3D Full
description:
Feel like a medieval hunter with this unusual archery hunting simulator!

Find the prey in the forest, tense the string of your bow, aim carefully and shoot right in vital point! Feel as a Robin Hood or Oliver Quinn with Archery Animal Hunting Simulator 3D!

Chase different forest animals - rabbits, deer, boars, wolves, bears – herbivores and predators alike, aim carefully, as a real sniper and try to kill your target as fast as you can! Seek for your prey accurately and pull the trigger without any doubts! Beware the wounded predators and don’t become a victim yourself!

Use all your hunting skills, earn coins to buy new bows or crossbows! Complete different mission to unlock all achievements and prove yourself as a real hunt master! Try powerful weapons to raise up your effectiveness!

Keep yourself alert – your prey could appear at any moment! Get the most impressive trophy with Archery Animal Hunting Simulator 3D!

Archery Animal Hunting Simulator 3D features:
Unusual hunting simulator in 3D!
Different species of forest fauna as your prey!
Varies bows and arrows, and even crossbows - try to unlock all of them!

Be ready for the great bow hunt! Try Archery Animal Hunting Simulator 3D and prove your worth as a master archer!
